meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Compared with</kanji> something else, this is <kanji>above</kanji>. That's another way to say that what you have is <vocabulary>more than</vocabulary> something else. <vocabulary>That's all</vocabulary>. ;)
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
